Description:
Formatted 1/8 inch tape data cartridges for DDS drives.
Low-cost and high-capacity.
Durable, designed for midrange servers.
Faster performance; greater storage capacity.
Fewer tape swaps during operations.
Unmatched reliability.
HP DSS cartridges provide a great low-cost, high-capacity data archiving solution. As they feature a durability rating two times greater than the industry standard, they're the perfect backup media choice for midrange servers. They deliver faster performance and a greater storage capacity, too!
HP DSS cartridges provide a great low-cost, high-capacity data archiving solution. As they feature a durability rating two times greater than the industry standard, they're the perfect backup media choice for midrange servers. They deliver faster performance and a greater storage capacity, too! That translates as cartridges that require far fewer tape swaps during backup operations, saving both time and money. Every unit is also exhaustively quality tested to ensure unmatched reliability.
1/8"
Name: HP 1/8 inch Tape DDS Data Cartridge
